adrFormatAddress: 1628 Broadway, New York, NY 10019-7584, USA

originalText.text: Best way to get around town and see/hear about the city.  Friendly drivers and ticketing staff.  Buy your tickets on line for discount and they'll print off at site.

text.text: Best way to get around town and see/hear about the city.  Friendly drivers and ticketing staff.  Buy your tickets on line for discount and they'll print off at site.

originalText.text: We booked 2 circles but the buses sit so long in traffic everywhere... we kind of wasted our day. We didn't really end up with time to hop on and off as it was so slow getting around even the red loop. Didn't even get to do the blue loop. This was a waste of money for us and when we bought the tickets they said about 1.5hr for red loop and an hour for blue loop but ...eek.

originalText.text: There is no office at time square.  Just one person standing in official attire on the street and selling tickets.  We were there at 4pm to buy tickets assuming the rides are available until midnight since it was 30th December.  But the guy said last ride will be at 7pm only.  But they price is higher usual.  It was not at all worthy because of so much traffic and you can cover too less.  I don’t have any experience on a regular day.

originalText.text:
Omg this is the worst people in New York . The seller on the street try to steal your money or any money you have they start with rate and try to change it till you agree .
In my case I didn’t want to give them my money and guess what happen the curse me and calling me names and spits on my kids and wife . I even called 911 for them but police nyc didn’t do any action .. I will add picture to the review .. but they are punch of Thieves on the street .. don’t deal with those kind of people .. very bad and the bus trip never right ..

originalText.text: Omgoodness. I used to use this service before Covid, and it was great. However, after the pandemic,  it's horrible. I recently paid $ 300+ and didn't get to ride because you have to find the bus stops, and every bus employee has a different direction.  They also told us the bus went to Harlem, and another topview worker said it didn't.  We were running around like idiots. The next time I visit NYC, I will find an alternative way to get around and visit. Topview bus went downhill. I asked for a refund or even a partial refund and never got one. Overpriced and a waste of my hard working money.
